QuestData.Title: The Golden Lotus
QuestData.Description: The Golden Lotus have guarded the Vale for centuries, keeping it safe and hidden from harm.$B$BRecent events have unleashed terrible horrors upon our sacred vale, but allies of the Golden Lotus still stand against them, attempting to bring peace.$B$BIf you wish to help, you had best join them at the Setting Sun Garrison.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Anji Autumnlight at the Setting Sun Garrison in the Vale of Eternal Blossoms.
QuestData.RewardText: Grim times, $c. We welcome any help you have to offer.
